request_summary: Launch a new line of spicy coffee beans with market insights and marketing strategy, followed by legal compliance check.

execution_stages.description: Conduct market research on spicy coffee trends and develop marketing messaging.

sub_tasks: Investigate current consumer trends in flavored coffee
Analyze competitive products in the spicy coffee segment
Identify potential market opportunities and risks associated with spicy coffee
agents.expected_output: Market report detailing current trends, competitive analysis, opportunities, and risks.

sub_tasks: Create a catchy and appealing marketing blurb for the spicy coffee
Define the target demographic for the spicy coffee line
Develop value propositions highlighting the unique aspects of spicy coffee
agents.expected_output: A compelling marketing blurb and a defined target demographic profile with value propositions.

execution_stages.description: Legal review of previous outputs to ensure compliance with advertising laws and regulations.

sub_tasks: Review marketing claims for compliance with truth-in-advertising laws
Check for compliance with any health-related claims or warnings required
agents.expected_output: Compliance report ensuring all marketing material meets legal standards.

optimization_notes: This ordering allows for initial research and marketing to influence each other without delay, and ensures legal compliance before any launch phases, reducing risk of legal issues.
